Package com.gcu.apartmentx.data

Class ApartmentDataService

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.apartmentx.data.ApartmentDataService
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataAccessInterface<ApartmentEntity>
@Service public class ApartmentDataService extends Object implements DataAccessInterface<ApartmentEntity>
Service class that handles data access logic for apartments Implements the DataAccessInterface for CRUD operations on apartments
